CustomField.description: This is the number of minutes an employee is expected to have so far. This number increases by the training task's 'duration mins.' field when a training task is past due date. Used to calculate if an employee is ahead or behind schedule.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of minutes an employee is expected to have at this time. This number is calculated/increases based on the training tasks' due date.
CustomField.label: Expected Mins. Due
